rule: Each section in the output should be clearly separated and follow the order: Company names, People names, Specific topics, General themes.
input: Bill Gates attended a summit on healthcare reform and global vaccination efforts by Pfizer.
output:
Company names: Pfizer  
People names: Bill Gates  
Specific topics: healthcare reform, global vaccination efforts  
General themes: public health, global health initiatives
evaluation:
The chatbot's output complies with the required format specified in the description. The output includes four categories: Company names, People names, Specific topics, and General themes, each followed by a corresponding list (even though all except Company names are single entries in this example). The format uses clearly labeled sections and separates the elements within each section using commas where necessary (although in this case, each section listed only one element).

No violation.
OK
